## HeaderTableGroupComponent class

Component for gathering information about table group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HeaderTableGroupComponent implements HeaderTableGroup 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [columns](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.columns.md) |  | <code>HeaderTableGroupColumn[]</code> | Array of columns that are in this group (also recursive columns) |
|  [cssClass](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.cssclass.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Css class applied to group |
|  [groupContext](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.groupcontext.md) |  | <code>HeaderTableGroupContext</code> | Gets group context for current group |
|  [groups](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.groups.md) |  | <code>HeaderTableGroup[]</code> | Content of current group, can contain nested groups or columns |
|  [template](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.template.md) |  | <code>TemplateRef&lt;HeaderTableGroupContext&gt;</code> | Template that is used for rendering of this group |
|  [title](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.title.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Title for column group, text that is displayed |
|  [titleVisible](./grid.headertablegroupcomponent.titlevisible.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether is title for group visible, or not |
